thread.title: ZOPO Color C5 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and dual WhatsApp feature unveiled
thread.title_full: ZOPO Color C5 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and dual WhatsApp feature unveiled

title: ZOPO Color C5 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and dual WhatsApp feature unveiled
text:
ZOPO Color C5 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and dual WhatsApp... ZOPO Color C5 with 5-inch HD display, selfie flash and dual WhatsApp feature unveiled By - February 23, 2017 “The Color C5 is a budget offering with16GB of storage, 4G LTE, 5MP/2MP cameras and a 2,100mAh battery” 
China’s ZOPO has added a new budget smartphone to its portfolio with the launch of the Color C5 in its home market. The budget offering boots Android Marshmallow, and comes with a couple of software tweaks. The phone lets you access two Facebook, WhatsApp and Instagram accounts. It also gets a Picture-in-Picture PIP video mode, which lets you watch a video while using other apps. 
As far as the other specs are concerned, the ZOPO Color C5 offers a 5-inch HD IPS display with a pixel density of 294ppi. The phone is powered by a quad-core MediaTek MT6737 64-bit processor, mated to 1GB of RAM. The storage capacity on board is 16GB, which can be further increased up to 64GB by inserting a microSD card. 
The ZOPO Color C5 features a 5-megapixel primary snapper and a 2-megapixel secondary shooter, both accompanied by LED flash. In terms of connectivity, the device offers 4G LTE, dual-SIM slots, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0, USB OTG and GPS. It is fuelled by a 2,100mAh battery, and also comes with a Barcode and QR code scanner. 
There’s no word regarding the price of the ZOPO Color C5 at the moment. The brand did reveal that it will be available in four hues – Matte Black, Champagne, Rose Gold and White. We expect the phone to be launched in other markets like India in the coming weeks. Facebook Comments
